General.Name: Norsk Solar AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Norsk Solar AS, an independent power producer, develops, finances, builds, owns, and operates solar power plants in Norway. The company has proportionate ownership of 12.8 MW in 70 MW of solar power plants. It delivers energy to companies and state utilities under long term contracts. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Stavanger, Norway.

5.Name: Mr. Filippo  Comelli
5.Title: Exec. VP of Project Devel. & Project Fin.
